rules_text:
When Minister of Utility enters, make a pledge. [i](Create any white Clique enchantment token. If you already control a Clique, instead activate its Pledge without paying its cost.)[/i]
{2}, Sacrifice a Clique: Make a pledge.
notes:
Art Validated
